wynnlib.tooltip.powder.on_weapon: 用于武器制作时的效果
wynnlib.tooltip.powder.on_armour: 用于装备制作时的效果
wynnlib.tooltip.archetype.title: %s专精
wynnlib.archetype.desc.fallen: 腐化者可以造成大量伤害，并且受到伤害后变得更强。主要机制为腐化状态。进入腐化状态时，你无法受到治疗，但你已损生命值越多，各种能力也越强。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.battle_monk: 武道士身手敏捷，擅长近距离格斗。他们拥有战士专精的最强的机动性，且可以在短时间内造成多段攻击。因此武道士甚至具有一定的刺客成分。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.paladin: 圣骑士能承受大量伤害并且为队友提供支援。他们是不可撼动的壁垒，任何职业任何专精的承伤能力都不如圣骑士。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.boltslinger: 闪击射手适合在近距离中打出巨额伤害。他们的箭矢如雷雨一般砸向敌人，当然，这么做有时会让自己陷入险境。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.sharpshooter: 鹰眼射手能够在远距离造成致命一击。他们能够凭借射程决胜千里，且连续命中敌人时，会叠加专注的层数以进一步提高自己的伤害。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.trapper: 陷阱射手能够放置爆炸陷阱，并且可以召唤野兽。他们致力于大范围团控并且能够在安全的距离给敌人制造混乱。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.riftwalker: 空间法师在战斗中越战越勇。他们不仅机动性出色，且主要机制是名为疾风的状态效果。空间法师在战斗中，敌人会受到越来越多的疾风层数，从而令空间法师的伤害陡然上升。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.light_bender: 圣光法师是倾向于辅助类型的法师，并且造成治疗时变得更强。即使孤立无援，圣光法师仍可以召唤能够造成伤害和治疗的法球。独当一面！
wynnlib.archetype.desc.arcanist: 奥术法师能够带来毁灭性的伤害和混乱。他们可以存储法力值，并且接连不断地进行攻击。在技能足够的情况，奥术法师可以进行无尽的技能循环，不仅是敌人，就连自己也难以掌控这股力量。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.shadestepper: 暗影刺客能够隐匿自身，伺机待发。他们可以叠加巨额的伤害加成，并且在敌人意想不到的位置给予致命一击。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.trickster: 幻术刺客能够进行分身，并且有多种迷惑敌人的技能。他们擅长对大量的敌人打出控制效果。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.acrobat: 身法刺客来去如风，并且非常依赖连招配合。他们在半空中的时间可不比走在地上的时间少。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.summoner: 召唤师使用图腾和召唤物压制敌人。他们可以在保证自身安全的距离为自己的召唤物提供加成，以造成更多的伤害。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.ritualist: 大祭司能让奇迹诞生于歌舞升平中。他们的主要机制是假面系统，令其可以在飞行中切换三个不同的形态以获得不同的增益和技能。
wynnlib.archetype.desc.acolyte: 传教士牺牲自己的生命值为队友提供增益且可以造成伤害。建立自己的血池，并据此让自身能力更上一层楼。
wynnlib.ability.desc.bash: 对前方大范围区域重劈并造成伤害。
wynnlib.ability.desc.spear_proficiency_i: 使用长矛时，n{Main Attack}的伤害和范围增加。
wynnlib.ability.desc.double_bash: n{Bash}单次伤害降低，但在更远处额外重击一次。
wynnlib.ability.desc.charge: 向正前方冲锋。//8{(按潜行键可取消冲锋)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.tougher_skin: 获得永久f{+5%}免伤。////且你的装备鉴定词条每有f{1%}或者f{1点}生命回复，你获得f{+10}最大生命值。（至多+100）
wynnlib.ability.desc.vehement: 你的装备鉴定词条每有f{1%}或者f{1点}普通攻击伤害，你获得f{+2%}移动速度。（至多+20%）
wynnlib.ability.desc.uppercut: 对前方区域发起挑斩，对范围内的敌人造成伤害和击飞。
wynnlib.ability.desc.war_scream: 发出战吼，令范围内的敌人受到伤害并向你的位置拉扯，令自身和范围内的队友获得免伤。
wynnlib.ability.desc.heavy_impact: 使用n{Charge}后，对落地位置周围造成伤害。
wynnlib.ability.desc.quadruple_bash: 重击连续造成f{4}次伤害，单次伤害降低，范围更远。
wynnlib.ability.desc.fireworks: Mobs hit by n{Uppercut} will explode mid-air and receive additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.flyby_jab: Damage enemies in your way when using n{Charge}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.flaming_uppercut: n{Uppercut} will light mobs on fire, dealing damage every f{0.6} seconds.
wynnlib.ability.desc.half_moon_swipe: n{Uppercut} will deal a footsweep attack at a longer and wider angle. All elemental conversions become b{❉} Watier.
wynnlib.ability.desc.generalist: After casting f{3} different spells in a row, your next spell will cost f{5} Mana.
wynnlib.ability.desc.counter: When dodging a nearby enemy attack, get f{30%} chance to instantly attack back.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mantle_of_the_bovem: When casting n{War Scream}, create a holy shield around you that reduces all incoming damage by f{70%} for f{3} hits. (20s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.bakals_grasp: After casting n{War Scream}, become b{Corrupted}. (15s Cooldown)//You cannot heal while in that state.////While b{Corrupted}, every f{2%} of Health you lose will add f{+4} Raw Damage to your attacks. (Max 120)
wynnlib.ability.desc.spear_proficiency_i: Improve your n{Main Attack}'s damage and range when using a spear.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_uppercut_i: Reduce the Mana cost of n{Uppercut}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.aerodynamics: During n{Charge}, you can steer and change direction.
wynnlib.ability.desc.provoke: Mobs damaged by n{War Scream} will target only you for at least f{5s}.////Reduce the Mana cost of n{War Scream}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.air_shout: n{War Scream} will fire a projectile that can go through walls and deal damage multiple times.
wynnlib.ability.desc.enraged_blow: While b{Corrupted}, every f{1%} of Health you lose will increase your damage by f{+3%}. (Max 300%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.flying_kick: When using n{Charge}, enemies hit will halt your momentum, and get knockbacked.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_mantle: Add f{+2} additional charges to n{Mantle of the Bovemists}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.manachism: If you receive a hit that's less than f{5%} of your max HP, gain f{10} Mana. (1s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.boiling_blood: n{Bash} leave a trail of boiling blood behind its first explosion, slowing down and damaging enemies above it every f{0.4} seconds.
wynnlib.ability.desc.ragnarokkr: n{War Scream} become deafening, increasing its range and giving damage bonus to players.
wynnlib.ability.desc.ambidextrous: Increase your chance to attack with n{Counter} by f{+30%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.burning_heart: For every f{100} Health Bonus you have from item IDs, gain f{+2%} Fire Damage. (Max 100%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.intoxicating_blood: After leaving b{Corrupted}, gain f{2%} of the health lost back for each enemy killed while b{Corrupted}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.collide: Enemies thrown into walls from n{Flying Kick} will explode and receive additional damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.rejuvenating_skin: Regain back f{30%} of the damage you take as healing over f{30s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.comet: After being hit by n{Fireworks}, enemies will crash unto the ground and receive more damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.uncontainable_corru: Reduce the cooldown of n{Bak'al's Grasp} by f{5s}, and increase the raw damage gained for every f{2%} of health lost by f{+1}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.radiant_devotee: For every f{4%} Reflection you have from items, gain f{+1/5s} Mana Regen. (Max 10/5s)
wynnlib.ability.desc.whirlwind_strike: n{Uppercut} will create a strong gust of air, launching you upward with enemies.//(Hold shift to stay grounded)
wynnlib.ability.desc.mythril_skin: Gain f{+5%} Base Resistance and become immune to knockback.
wynnlib.ability.desc.armour_breaker: While b{Corrupted}, losing f{30%} Health will make your next n{Uppercut} destroy enemies' defences, rendering them weaker to damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shield_strike: When your n{Mantle of the Bovemist} loses all charges, deal damage around you for each Mantle individually lost.
wynnlib.ability.desc.sparkling_hope: Everytime you get healed f{5%} of your max health, deal damage to all nearby enemies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.massive_bash: While b{Corrupted}, every f{3%} Health you lose will add f{+1} Area of Effect to n{Bash}. (Max 10)
wynnlib.ability.desc.tempest: n{War Scream} will ripple the ground and deal damage f{3} times in a large area.
wynnlib.ability.desc.spirit_of_the_rabbi: Reduce the Mana cost of n{Charge} and increase your Walk Speed by f{+20%}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.massacre: While b{Corrupted}, if your effective attack speed is f{Slow} or lower, hitting an enemy with your n{Main Attack} will add f{+1%} to your b{Corrupted} bar.
wynnlib.ability.desc.axe_kick: Increase the damage of n{Uppercut}, but also increase its mana cost.
wynnlib.ability.desc.radiance: n{Bash} will buff your allies' positive IDs. (15s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_bash_ii: Reduce the Mana cost of n{Bash}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_war_scream: Reduce the Mana cost of n{War Scream}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.discombobulate: Every time you hit an enemy, briefly increase your elemental damage dealt to them by f{+2} (Additive, Max +50).//This bonus decays f{5} every second.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cyclone: After casting n{War Scream}, envelop yourself with a vortex that damages nearby enemies every f{0.5s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.thunderclap: n{Bash} will cast at the player's position and gain additional area of effect. All elemental conversions become e{✦} Thunder.
wynnlib.ability.desc.second_chance: When you receive a fatal blow, survive and regain f{30%} of your Health. (10m Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.blood_pact: If you do not have enough mana to cast a spell, spend health instead. (f{0.6%} health per mana)
wynnlib.ability.desc.haemorrhage: Reduce n{Blood Pact}'s health cost. (f{0.3%} health per mana)
wynnlib.ability.desc.brink_of_madness: If your health is f{25%} full or less, gain f{+40%} Resistance.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_uppercut_ii: Reduce the Mana cost of n{Uppercut}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.martyr: When you receive a fatal blow, all nearby allies become invincible.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_bomb: Throw a long-ranged arrow that explodes and deal high damage in a large area.//8{(self-damage for 25% of your DPS)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.bow_proficiency_i: Improve your n{Main Attack}'s damage and range when using a bow.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_bomb_: Reduce the Mana cost of n{Arrow Bomb}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.heart_shatter: If you hit a mob directly with n{Arrow Bomb}, shatter its heart and deal bonus damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.escape: Throw yourself backward to avoid danger.//(Hold shift while escaping to cancel)
wynnlib.ability.desc.double_shots: Double your n{Main attack} arrows, but they deal f{-30%} damage per arrow.//8{(This makes it hrader to hit far enimies)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.power_shots: Your n{Main Attack} arrows have increased speed and knockback.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_storm: Shoot two steam of f{8} arrows, dealing significant damage to close mobs and pushing them back.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_escape_i: Reduce the Mana cost of n{Escape}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_shield: Create a shield around you that deal damage and knock back mobs when triggered. (2 Charges)
wynnlib.ability.desc.windy_feet: When casting n{Escape}, give speed to yourself and nearby allies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_air_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Air attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_thunder_mast: Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_fire_mastery: Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_earth_master: Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.archer_water_master: Increase your base damage from all Water attacks.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_rain: When n{Arrow Shield} loses its last charge, unleash f{200} arrows raining down on enemies.
wynnlib.ability.desc.nimble_string: n{Arrow Storm} throw out f{+8} arrows per stream and shoot twice as fast.
wynnlib.ability.desc.phantom_ray: Condense n{Arrow Storm} into a single ray that damages enemies f{10} times per second.
wynnlib.ability.desc.fire_creep: n{Arrow Bomb} will leak a trail of fire for f{6s}, damaging enemies that walk into it every f{0.4s}
wynnlib.ability.desc.bryophyte_roots: When you hit an enemy with n{Arrow Storm}, create an area that slows them down and deals damage every f{0.4s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.triple_shots: Triple your n{Main Attack} arrows, but they deal f{-20%} damage per arrow.
wynnlib.ability.desc.frenzy: Every time you hit an enemy briefly gain f{+6%} Walk Speed. (Max 200%)//Decay f{-40%} of the bonus every second.
wynnlib.ability.desc.guardian_angels: Your protective arrows from n{Arrow Shield} will become sentient bows dealing damage up to f{8} times each to nearby enemies.//8{(Arrow Sheild will no longer push nearby enemies)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.focus: When hitting an aggressive enemy f{5+} blocks away, gain b{+1 Focus}. (Max 3)//Resets if you miss once.
wynnlib.ability.desc.basaltic_trap: When you hit the ground with n{Arrow Bomb}, leave a b{Trap} that damages enemies. (Max 2 Traps)
wynnlib.ability.desc.windstorm: n{Arrow Storm} shoot f{+1 stream} of arrows, effectively doubling its damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_storm: Reduce the Mana cost of n{Arrow Storm}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.grappling_hook: When casting n{Escape}, throw a hook that pulls you when hitting a block. If you hit an enemy, pull them towards you instead.//8{(Escape will not throw you backward anymore)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_shields: Give f{+2} charges to n{Arrow Shield}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.implosion: n{Arrow Bomb} will pull enemies towards you. If a b{Trap} is nearby, it will pull them towards it instead.//Increase n{Heart Shatter}'s damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.patient_hunter: Your b{Traps} will deal f{+20%} more damage for every second they are active. (Max +80%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.stormy_feet: n{Windy Feet} will last longer and add more speed.
wynnlib.ability.desc.refined_gunpowder: Increase the damage of n{Arrow Bomb}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.traveler: For every f{1%} Walk Speed you have from items, gain f{+1 Raw} Spell Damage. (Max 100)
wynnlib.ability.desc.twains_arc: If you have b{2+ Forcus}, holding shift will summon the Twain's Arc. Charge it up to shoot a destructive long-range beam.//8{(Damage is dealt as n{Main Attack} Damage)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.bouncing_bomb: n{Arrow Bomb} will bounce once when hitting a block or enemy.
wynnlib.ability.desc.fierce_stomp: When using n{Escape}, hold shift to quickly drop down and deal damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.more_traps: Increase the maximum amount of active b{Traps} you can have by f{+2}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.leap: When you double tap jump, leap forward. (2s Cooldown)
wynnlib.ability.desc.homing_shots: Your n{Main Attack} arrows will follow nearby enemies and not be affected by gravity.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shocking_bomb: n{Arrow Bomb} will not be affected by gravity, and all damage conversions become e{✦} Thunder.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_arrow_shield: n{Arrow Shield} will gain additional area of effect, knockback and damage.
wynnlib.ability.desc.mana_trap: Your b{Traps} will give you f{2.85} Mana per second when you stay close to them.
wynnlib.ability.desc.escape_artist: When casting n{Escape}, release f{120} arrows towards the ground.
wynnlib.ability.desc.better_guardian_ang: Your n{Guardian Angels} can shoot f{+4} arrows before disappearing.
wynnlib.ability.desc.initiator: If you do not damage an enemy for f{5s} or more, your next successful hit will deal f{+50%} damage and add b{+1 Focus}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_storm: Reduce the Mana cost of n{Arrow Storm}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.call_of_the_hound: n{Arrow Shield} summon a b{Hound} that will attack and drag aggressive enemies towards your traps.
wynnlib.ability.desc.arrow_hurricane: n{Arrow Storm} will shoot f{+2} stream of arrows.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_shiel: Reduce the Mana cost of n{Arrow Shield}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.rocket_jump: n{Arrow Bomb}'s self-damage will knockback you farther away.
wynnlib.ability.desc.shrapnel_bomb: n{Arrow Bomb}'s explosion will fling f{15} shrapnel, dealing damage in a large area.
wynnlib.ability.desc.decimator: n{Phantom Ray} will be increase its damage by f{10%} everytime you do not miss with it. (Max 50%)
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_escape_ii: Reduce the Mana cost of n{Escape}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_hook: Increases your n{Grappling Hook}'s range, speed and strength.
wynnlib.ability.desc.geyser_stomp: n{Fierce Stomp} will create geysers, dealing more damage and vertical knockback.
wynnlib.ability.desc.crepuscular_ray: If you have b{5 Focus}, casting n{Arrow Storm} will make you levitate and shoot f{20} homing arrows per second until you run out of b{Focus}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.grape_bomb: n{Arrow Bomb} will throw f{3} additional smaller bombs when exploding.
wynnlib.ability.desc.elusive: If you do not get hit for f{8+} seconds, become immune to self-damage and remove n{Arrow Storm}'s recoil.//8{(Dodging counts as not getting hit)}
wynnlib.ability.desc.tangled_traps: Your b{Traps} will be connected by a rope that deals damage to enemies every f{0.2s}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.stronger_patient_hu: Add f{+80%} Max Damage to n{Patient Hunter}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.snow_storm: Enemies near you will be slowed down.
wynnlib.ability.desc.all_seeing_panoptes: Your bows from n{Guardian Angels} become all-seeing, increasing their range, damage and letting them shoot up to f{+5} times each.
wynnlib.ability.desc.cheaper_arrow_bomb_: Reduce the Mans cost of n{Arrow Bomb}.
wynnlib.ability.desc.minefield: Allow you to place b{+6 Traps}, but with reduced damage and range.
